bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shan zhu yu 山 茱萸：暖腰膝，助水臟，除一切風，逐一切氣，破癥結，治酒鼻齇 , “It warms the lower back and knees, assists water depots, removes all types of wind, expels all types of qi, breaks through conglomeration-illness nodes, and cures wine nose sediments ”. Jiu bie 酒鱉 , wine turtle [5]

Pathological Condition of bie jia 鱉瘕 , turtle[-shaped] conglomeration-illness, caused by excessive consumption of wine. Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 1: 猶有所謂血鱉、氣鱉、酒鱉者，又不可 不知也 , “Furthermore there are the so-called ‘blood turtle’, ‘qi turtle’, and ‘ wine turtle ’. One must know them”.
